message: Hello Bob, I have an exclusive product I believe you'll find uniquely valuable. I'm offering it at $2500000. This price reflects its exceptional quality and the premium benefits it delivers. I'm confident you'll agree this is an excellent investment opportunity. Looking forward to your thoughts.

Alice, while the product sounds interesting, the initial price is higher than I'm comfortable with. I value the potential benefits, but my budget is a key consideration. I'm willing to offer $1200000. This reflects what I believe is a fair price point.
